About Me

A Few Things About Myself...

Sometimes it is hard to introduce yourself because you know yourself so well that you do not know where to start with. Let me give a try to see what kind of image you have about me through my self-description. I hope that my impression about myself and your impression about me are not so different. I wish to learn and gain experience in the field of baked goods with complete taste and aesthetic appeal.

Passion pour la pâtisserie

The Beginning

My name is Sabeena, and at the end of 2017, I decided to quit my job in Architecture and take a few months off to concentrate on myself and things I love. I have always loved cooking, even though baking is – and will always be – my first love.

My Journey at Lavonne Academy

Time to get Professional

'Lavonne Academy of Baking Science & Pastry Arts, is a world class baking academy accredited by the internationally recognised City & Guilds, London. A whole range of courses suitable for amateurs as well as those with industry experience. From our intensive 960-hour Diploma program, to the Six Week Certificate Course, hobby classes over the weekends, and sugar-art classes through the week, and Masterclasses by internationally recognised Chefs, there is always something to learn for baking enthusiasts.

Sabeelicious

My first business venture

Some people are destined to be entrepreneurs. From the time they get through school, or maybe even before that, they’re hungry to start a business and lead it to success, and they’ll stop at nothing to make that dream a reality.
